author: Staff Reporter
text:
A person belonging to Arunthathiar community in Karipatti Village was injured and eight houses were damaged by members of Dalit community here on Monday night.

The police said that members of Dalit community entered the village in Karipatti on Monday and misbehaved in public.

It is said that they were warned and sent off. Later, they came back and damaged the houses. They also inflicted injuries on Selvakumar (23), who has been admitted to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital.

Based on a complaint, the Karipatti police registered a case under Sections 147 (rioting), 294 (b) (uttering obscene words in public place), 324 (voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous means or weapons), 427 (mischief causing damage to the amount of Rs. 50) and 506 (ii) (criminal intimidation) of the IPC.
title: One injured, 8 houses damaged in group clash
